channel.title: ThibautPlg Github page
channel.description: Recent content on ThibautPlg Github page

item.title: A Custom Supertuxkart Server
item.description: Each year, my company is organizing an offsite week in a nice place for all of us to meet, introduce new employees and share a bit of our life. One of the main attractions is a bunch of races on the FOSS game SuperTuxKart, for which I’m quite bad. This year, I had an idea: instead of trying to host a game on someone’s computer and having trouble with firewall and stuff, what if I prepared a server and literally plug’n’play it during this week?

item.title: About
item.description: This site/blog is made with hugo and uses the minimalist hugo-blog-awesome theme.
